0.title: How To: Documentation
0.content: # Documentation How to update and build the documentation. ## Updating: 1. Clone the repo locally 2. Make the changes to the required markdown files 3. Push to github's master branch. The website should get updated soon enough. ## Testing Documentation Locally: Sometimes, it is convenient to test the documentation locally, and then push it all at once. To do this, after cloning the repo, run ``` bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --port 4001 ``` and navigate to: ``` http://localhost:4001/ ```
